entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
